Title: User stories
Description:
| ID | As a… | i… | because… | Priority | Duration (hours) |
| -- | -- | -- | -- | -- | -- |
| 1 | user | want to encounter a page where i can input my display name before i get to the chat page | i want others to be able to recognize me. | MEDIUM | 3 |
| 2 | user | want to see the messages of others | i want to know what others are saying. | HIGH | 5 |
| 3 | user | want to be able to send messages | i want to be able to communicate with others | HIGH | 3 |
| 4 | user | want to get a notification when a message is sent | i want to know when there are people actively messaging in the chat | LOW | 4 |
| 5 | user | want to know at what time messages were sent | i want to know more about the messages i am reading. | LOW | 1 |
| 6 | user | want to be able to read older messages | i want to be able to read older messages. | MEDIUM | 3 |
| 7 | user | want to be able to react to other messages | i want to be able to have a fluent conversation | MEDIUM | 3 |
Creator: son@vdburg.site
